issue.title: [CF 1653] Stuck in Edit Mode (only in scenarios?)
issue.body:
Recently it happened that I found myself stuck in  edit mode of TMW after a reload. Not sure if this is related to some “scenarios” (invasions and such).

Another reload doesn’t help in this case. Have to force-quit the client.


> Posted by CurseForge user Portalbendarwinden | Imported from CurseForge issue #1653 | Raw

comments.body:
It seems this was indeed closely tied to some weird scenario issues that occured last week with the Warfront and invasions. At least I have not experienced it again since then. Nevertheless strange, since TMW entered edit mode without any UI interaction (besides the UI reload).


> Posted by CurseForge user Portalbendarwinden
